definition:
Age - measure of central tendency. Select one of the following:
- mean
- median
NA = not available, NR, not reported
accepted: mean, median, NA
entry_guidance:
Age - measure of central tendency. Select one of the following:
- mean
- median
NA = not available, NR, not reported

definition: Age - value of central tendency (numeric)
accepted: Numeric; NA if not available/reported
entry_guidance: Age - value of central tendency (numeric)

definition:
Age - measure of variability (listed in order of preference)

SD = standard deviation (1st preference)
SE = standard error (2nd)
95CI = 95% confidence interval (3rd)
IQR = interquartile range
range = range (5th)
NA = not available, not reported (6th)
accepted: SD, SE, 95CI, IQR, range, NA
entry_guidance:
Age - measure of variability (listed in order of preference)

SD = standard deviation (1st preference)
SE = standard error (2nd)
95CI = 95% confidence interval (3rd)
IQR = interquartile range
range = range (5th)
NA = not available, not reported (6th)

definition: Age - value(s) of variability
accepted: Free text; NA if not available/reported
entry_guidance: Age - value(s) of variability

definition:
Ethnicity (select one)
- white = White/Caucasian
- africa = African/ Afro-Caribbean
- E_asia = East Asia (Japan, Korea, China)
- S_asia = South Asia (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka)
- SE_asia = South East Asian (everything East of India and South of China which will cover Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore)
- latin = Latin American (non-African origin; central and S America, without Caribbean)
- other = other (specify in next column)
accepted: white, africa, E_asia, S_asia, SE_asia, latin, mixed, other, NA
entry_guidance:
Ethnicity (select one)
- white = White/Caucasian
- africa = African/ Afro-Caribbean
- E_asia = East Asia (Japan, Korea, China)
- S_asia = South Asia (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka)
- SE_asia = South East Asian (everything East of India and South of China which will cover Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore)
- latin = Latin American (non-African origin; central and S America, without Caribbean)
- other = other (specify in next column)
